#Text=Use Video Communication in Homecare

#Text=Video communication services are the most trending features over the Internet where with a web-cam , microphone and Internet access , Video calls to family and friends around the world are just one click away .
#Text=As with any type of communication over the network , we are going to share a lot of private and Personal Information , and here , the most important point , " Privacy " .
#Text=In this article we are going to list some of the steps and tasks we can do with our computers in the home-care to set a safer environment for our video calls .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Ensure computer safety .
#Text=Firewall , to protect your computer from different types of Intrusion attacks ( computer hackers ) , system security preferences need to be established .
#Text=One of them is the Firewall .
#Text=In order to get all the benefits , the firewall needs to be activated and check the list of programs which are allowed to connect to the internet .
#Text=The rest of the programs wo n't be able to use the network .
#Text=Sometimes , there are requests from running programs to allow them to use the network , Be careful and allow only programs you know .

#Text=Install anti-spyware software before installing the video call software or even before continuing on to using the Internet , make sure that your system is protected by an anti-virus which can stop the malware , spywares and viruses , and gives some Internet protection to keep your computer safe .
#Text=Note that so called " good antiviruses " usually need a paid subscription , However , there are several free anti virus programs which are as good if not better than some paid versions .

column1: #Text=A search for Free Antivirus Programs will help you immensely .
#Text=Start with free anti-virus , If the system is not protected yet ,
#Text=Activate the system default program ( Windows Defender on Microsoft systems and Mac Defender on Apple systems ) until downloading and installing a better anti-virus .
#Text=Use video calling software .
#Text=Choose the software you are comfortable with , and do n't forget that privacy is the most important thing in all these steps .

#Text=The Software developer 's reputation is important to determine if your call data is well protected or not , where these developers provide more security to their servers , the more potentially secure they are , these servers are used to save data about their clients ' accounts and their software users , usually , the video streaming will go through their server also .
#Text=Download the software .
#Text=After choosing the software , search its main website for the download link .
#Text=Use the software company 's product website to get the latest versions , Most applications will update themselves once installed .

#Text=Click on " Install Manually " if the option is available , here you will see if any " Bundled Software " is included , be sure to uncheck ALL , these are usually not required for the application to perform normally and you do n't get anything you did n't ask for !
#Text=, Create an account .
#Text=search for contacts you want to add to your contact list and wait for their response .
#Text=BEWARE !
#Text=if you do not personally know the person you are adding to your contact list , he/she could be dangerous .
#Text=Never ever trust an unknown , they are only words on a screen and you have no idea who or what is behind there ! !
#Text=NEVER initiate a video call with an unknown person , no matter what they say or how persuasive they are !
#Text=So much information is seen in the background of the video by stalkers and generally bad people .
#Text=Develop communication environment .

#Text=Before your friend can see you , position the camera to hide or show what you want in the house if you care about background details , Keep the room nicely lit so that the camera image is clear , after setting the video call environment , you will be able to enjoy your video calls , whether Family or Professional .
#Text=Tips
#Text=Avoid Unknown Contacts .

#Text=For your own security , do n't talk to strangers about your personal life nor enter into a video call , always to talk to those who you know are that person , class mates , real life friends , The Internet is NOT safe in any respect , a Firewall and all the antivirus in the world will only slow but not stop some-one who is determined , so do n't give them any reason to try to " Hack " you .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Social App Allow Access .

#Text=We are surrounded by an infinite number of social apps , we need to be very careful dealing with them , where each time for some and mostly not important reasons , you get a request from a social app that wants access to your profile and friends Info , and here you need to be AWAKE .
#Text=Every click on the Allow button means you are sharing your private Info to some-one you do n't know nor what they do with your Info .
#Text=We need to use only necessary applications and only from reputable Software Companies .
#Text=, this will keep you safer and help keep your privacy where it belongs , PRIVATE ! .
